titleStmt.title: The loyal citizen revived. A speech made by Alderman Garroway, at a common-hall, On Tuesday the 17. of January, 1642 upon occasion of a speech delivered there the Friday before, by Mr. Pym, at the reading of His Majesties Answer to the late petition.
titleStmt.author: Garraway, Henry, Sir, 1575-1646.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery, San Marino, California.
